content:
You're welcome! West Elm and Crate & Barrel are both excellent choices for finding a high-quality rug that fits your style and needs. They offer a wide selection of stylish and modern rugs, and their websites are user-friendly, making it easy to browse and filter by size, material, color, and price.

Remember to take your time, read reviews, and check the return policies before making a purchase. It's also a good idea to order a rug sample or swatch to ensure the color and texture are exactly what you're looking for.

If you have any more questions or need further recommendations, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I hope you find the perfect rug for your conversational circle, and I'm sure it will look amazing with your new velvet sofa set!

Good luck with your rug shopping, and I hope you'll enjoy your cozy new living room!
